alert.note: Alert for Coastal Georgetown; Coastal Horry (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Freeze Warning issued November 28 at 9:20PM EST until November 29 at 9:00AM EST by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM EST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures as low as 26 expected. * WHERE...In North Carolina, Coastal Brunswick, Coastal New Hanover, Coastal Pender, and Inland New Hanover Counties. In South Carolina, Coastal Georgetown and Coastal Horry Counties. * WHEN...Until 9 AM EST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions could kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent water pipes from freezing; wrap or drain or allow them to drip slowly.
